attributes.action: FAIR FUNDING FOR ALL IN HIGHER EDUCATION !
attributes.background:
How does government expect a student to afford accommodation and essentials when in a full time education just because their parents earn above the minimum wage. 
Lets make it fair and equal for everyone to be able to afford a higher education.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

You could start a new petition calling on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action, such as debate student maintenance loans or to reverse their decision to abolish student maintenance grants.

Alternatively, you may want to sign this petition, which is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/118533
